content:
/>
X.v.1.A.4.d
.
Decision Review Rights and Notification Requirements
A claimant has the right to seek further review of any decision resulting from a review under
38 CFR 3.105(b)
.
Regardless of the outcome of the case,
notify the claimant that the review was conducted
explain the reasons for the decision, and
furnish review rights.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section A  - Compensation Service and Pension and Fiduciary (P&F) Service Guidance
citation: Part X, Subpart v, Chapter 1, Section A
